TopicTitle: Measure Electric Charge Rate with huge numbers

Articles.Content:
Hello,

i have an idea for a challenge, but i'd need a way to measure the electric charge rate precisely while handling huge numbers of ec. The stock Display cuts off at a certain point ( the (-1234) number turns to (-2345... and cuts off ).

Clicking on Solar panels directly reveals the output rate, but differently aligned and placed panels have different outputs and if you have 20+ panels making screenshots of all of them is not an option.

Is there a way to measure this? Like some Gauge that tells you the current charge rate, maybe included in a mod (KER sadly doesn't display this)

Or does anybody have another idea to get a good measurement of the current energy production of a craft?
